name: Dice Or Die: The Reaper's Game
name_original: Dice Or Die: The Reaper's Game
description: A board-based roguelike dicebuilder Roll your dice across the board to optimize their positioning and outcomes, gather points, and use those points to upgrade your dice and expand your team to survive against the dice that the Reaper drops in to oppose you. Can you gain enough points to escape your fate, or will the Reaper claim another victim?
